publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-338 Richard Lochhead: Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh—That the Parliament notes with regret the sad death of the Swedish Minister for Foreign Affairs, Anna Lindh; expresses condolences to her family and to the people of Sweden; notes that Ms Lindh was known for her openness and approachability, and deplores the apparently unmotivated attack upon her. Supported by: Christine May*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Stewart Stevenson*, Shona Robison*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Brian Adam*, Iain Smith*, Phil Gallie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Alex Johnstone*, Fiona Hyslop*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Alex Fergusson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Sarah Boyack*, Tricia Marwick*, Maureen Macmillan*, Bruce Crawford*, Margaret Jamieson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*

S2M-338 Richard Lochhead: Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh—That the Parliament notes with regret the sad death of the Swedish Minister for Foreign Affairs, Anna Lindh; expresses condolences to her family and to the people of Sweden; notes that Ms Lindh was known for her openness and approachability, and deplores the apparently unmotivated attack upon her. Supported by: Christine May, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Stewart Stevenson, Shona Robison, Mr Rob Gibson, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr Bruce McFee, Brian Adam, Iain Smith, Phil Gallie, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Johnstone, Fiona Hyslop, Eleanor Scott, Ms Sandra White, Alex Fergusson, Roseanna Cunningham, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Sarah Boyack, Tricia Marwick, Maureen Macmillan, Bruce Crawford, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Jackie Baillie, Robin Harper, Bristow Muldoon*, Cathy Peattie*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mrs Margaret Smith*, Jim Mather*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Shiona Baird*, Mr David Davidson*, Chris Ballance*, Fergus Ewing*
S2M-338 Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh (lodged on 11 September 2003) Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*, Mark Ballard*, Robert Brown*
S2M-338 Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh (lodged on 11 September 2003) Scott Barrie*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Neil*
S2M-338 Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh (lodged on 11 September 2003) Dr Jean Turner*, Michael McMahon*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-338 Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh (lodged on 11 September 2003) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-338 Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh (lodged on 11 September 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-338 Condolences on Death of Anna Lindh (lodged on 11 September 2003) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
